metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9097 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The mail gem before 2.5.5 for Ruby (aka A Really Ruby Mail Library) is vulnerable to SMTP command injection via CRLF sequences in a RCPT TO or MAIL FROM command, as demonstrated by CRLF sequences immediately before and after a DATA substring.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9097` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-mail - 2.6.3+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-mail package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.3+dfsg1-1').
